name: Friday Night Funkin Scratched
description:
(CLICK THE START BUTTON IN THE TOP RIGHT CORNER MULTIPLE TIMES ONCE THE GAME LOADS)

Uh oh! Ur tryna kiss ur hot girlfriend... eh you get the point. Its just FNF, but I remade it in Scratch!

Use the arrow keys to funk. You can also change this in Options.

Credit to the Funkin Team. Without them, this project would've never existed.
